name: Survival Nation
abstract: An open-world online RPG survival game. You will kill zombies, acquire weapons, learn new skills, craft, explore the world, complete quests, and fight for survival in Solo, PVE and PVP modes.

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Italian, French
detail.app_release_note:
- Added realistic interactions for usable items - for example, to eat something, you must first remove a cork or open something, etc.
- Opened up more interiors - some buildings that were previously inaccessible for players now have interiors.
- Added new interactable shelves and cabinets within these interiors.
- Added exploding barrels.
- Made bottles and tomatoes breakable.
- Improved player body movement to look more realistic.
- Improved terrain quality.
- Improved the appearance of campfires at night.
- Improved the muzzle flash effect in firearms.
- Added air bubbles while filling the water canteen.
- Enhanced the sounds of melee weapons.
- Fixed an issue where the hand sometimes had a strange offset when grabbing the stabilizer.
- Other minor issues.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4 Pro
